subject: Re: Doubt in Httpservletrequest and Httpservletresponse
msgSnippet: There are a whole host of tools available for testing servlets.  Visit junit.org to see a list of them. Mike Bresnahan ... Satinder Singh
messageBody:
There are a whole host of tools available for testing servlets. Visit
junit.org to see a list of them.

Mike Bresnahan
-----
"Satinder Singh" <satinderynr@...> wrote in message
news:20030528052148.69529.qmail@......
> Hi Everybody,
> As I am new to Junit I have created some small examples to test on junit
but now when I am trying to test a method of servlet having a parameters
like HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse here I am stuck.
> Would anyone please tell me how to test a method with this type of complex
parameters.
> Thanx
> Satinder.
